Body: Initial report: User experiencing intermittent network disconnections when working from home. VPN connection drops every 30 minutes.
IT Team Response: We have reviewed your network logs and identified the issue. Please try updating your VPN client to the latest version.
Password reset request for jane.smith@company.com. User reports being locked out after multiple failed login attempts.
Password has been reset and sent to user via secure email. Please check your primary email for new credentials.
Need assistance installing ProjectFlow software on Windows 11 machine. Installation keeps failing at 75% completion.
Printer showing 'Paper Jam' error but no paper is actually jammed. Error persists after restart.
Issue resolved: Replaced faulty paper sensor. Printer is now functioning normally.
Database performance has degraded significantly since last maintenance window. Query times increased from 2 seconds to 30+ seconds.
Currently investigating index fragmentation and query execution plans. Will provide update by EOD.
